action.action-desc: Mr. Armstrong (for himself and Mr. Ivey) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to permit payments to be made to the law firms of court-appointed attorneys, and for other purposes.

section.text: Section 3006A(d)(1) of title 18, United States Code, is amended by inserting after this section the following: , or a law firm designated by the attorney so appointed,.
